title: When will this update be rolled out for my Pixel 3XL and will I receive a notification about this?
content: When will the update in the associated blog post:https://blog.google/products/pixel/new-pixel-features-drop/ be available for my Pixel 3XL and will I be notified automatically that this update is ready to be downloaded & installed?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
